mapper.select: SELECT t.ticketCode, ticketName, TO_CHAR(sales_start, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') as sales_start, TO_CHAR(sales_end, 'YYYY"년" MM"월" DD"일"') as sales_end, s.address1, detail.price, t.storeCode FROM ticket t JOIN ( select ticketcode, max(price) as price from ticketDetail group by ticketcode ) detail on detail.ticketCode=t.ticketcode JOIN store s ON t.storeCode=s.storeCode WHERE t.ticketCode=#{ticketCode}
SELECT TO_CHAR(use_start, 'YYYY-MM-DD') as use_start FROM ticket where storeCode=#{storeCode}
